Detailed Description

A file that contains the defeinitions of vaerious constants

Variable Documentation

const int MAX_ERASED_SPLITTERS = 3

maximum number of tokens that can be erased from the start of a sentence when considered to be sentence-splitting(ie. ,ale i...)

const int MAX_SENTENCE_SIZE = 100

for security reasons, maximum size of any sentence, if a longer sentence is provided, it will be considered wrong (not making sense) without any further analysis
